# numberOfItems

**Instance Property**

The number of items in the snapshot.

## Declaration

```swift
var numberOfItems: Int { get }
```

## Getting item and section metrics

- **numberOfSections**: The number of sections in the snapshot.
- **numberOfItems(inSection:)**: Returns the number of items in the specified section of the snapshot.

items.description: The number of sections in the snapshot.
items.name: numberOfSections

items.description: Returns the number of items in the specified section of the snapshot.
items.name: numberOfItems(inSection:)
